alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Douglas; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:28AM CDT until June 29 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Piatt County in central Illinois... Southwestern Champaign County in east central Illinois... Northwestern Douglas County in east central Illinois... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 628 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Bement, or 8 miles southeast of Monticello, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Tolono around 645 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pesotum, Tuscola, Villa Grove and Camargo. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 209 and 227. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
